short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dots Game, choose matching dots to make them disappear

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Link dots of the same color by swiping your finger to connect them. Create squares to clear all dots of that color. Race against time as new dots drop from above - plan your moves carefully and keep the board from filling up!
